reviewText: I was sold a disk that when inserted into an standard DVD player said it was the wrong origin
These movies are the best! I love the Hunger Games movies!
It can be hard to watch because its from europe I think. You have to change settings every time you watch it.
Will not play on dvd or blue ray players in the US. I recieved it for a birthday gift! I AM SO ANGRY! !
Horrible do not buy it doesn't play even in my blu Ray DVD player wat a big joke this is so please don't buy this piece of s*** movie combo it won't play
Same as reviewer above, this video does not play... Bought for a Christmas present... Very disappointed

This product did not have the play information on it prior to me purchasing it. Bought it for my kid for Christmas and can't play in on our DVD player. Now I have to return it and purchase it elsewhere. What a headache!
The company does not stand by it's products, the movie set I purchased did not work on my Blu Ray and they refuse to fix the problem.  Beware!
